channel.title: How to make owner symbol be side their name in chat on nrs3server 4
channel.description: ye my friend made a server with nrs3server 4 and he can't figure out how to have owner symbol beside his name can someone help me?

item.title: How to make owner symbol be side their name in chat on nrs3server 4
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

[quote=“noobs1234111, post:6, topic:471339”]DO NOT LISTEN TO CARLOS, he obviously doesn’t know what he’s talking about…

  1. Get a sprite editor
  2. download a crown pack (There is one on rune-server)
  3. Open the sprite editor, load your cache.
  4. search sprite 1455 & replace the crown you want to replace
  5. pack to cache
  6. compile, and run.

If you need some more help, pm me.

~Andrew[/quote]

you gott add em to floatbuffer.java too i think?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make owner symbol be side their name in chat on nrs3server 4

item.title: How to make owner symbol be side their name in chat on nrs3server 4
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“RSPS MAKER Carlos, post:5, topic:471339”]why post
if your not gonna help?

kids these days[/quote]

I don’t care about someone having trouble swapping out an image with another image, lol. I’ve also helped more people than you have. You don’t know what you’re talking about (cute try).

P.S. I’m an adult, lol.

On Topic: Use a Cache Editing program.

item.title: How to make owner symbol be side their name in chat on nrs3server 4
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

dont forget once you have added the crowns in cache, you gotta set what crown to have for what right in floatbuffer.java(client folder) i think thats what the file is called :P, otherwise the crowns will be in the cache but wont appear in chatbox

well that how you do it for 667/*** dno abt 718/*** should be similar?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make owner symbol be side their name in chat on nrs3server 4

item.title: How to make owner symbol be side their name in chat on nrs3server 4
item.dc:creator: @noobs1234111 noobs1234111
item.description:
@noobs1234111 wrote:

DO NOT LISTEN TO CARLOS, he obviously doesn’t know what he’s talking about…

  1. Get a sprite editor
  2. download a crown pack (There is one on rune-server)
  3. Open the sprite editor, load your cache.
  4. search sprite 1455 & replace the crown you want to replace
  5. pack to cache
  6. compile, and run.

If you need some more help, pm me.

~Andrew

Read full topic

make one
by going to google saving it
and make it apply to your server
p.s. nrs3 doesnt have a cache you CAN EDIT, its more like a server download game you cant edit the looks.
